#summary Description of Boundless
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

Boundless is a PHP Framework -- it provides you with the tools to build web applications in less time.

= Details =

Fresh distributions of Boundless come with a few "[http://code.google.com/p/boundless/w/Compounds Compounds]" - Access, Categories, Classes, Pages, and Users. Applications built on Boundless are collections of Compounds that work together or independently.
